revision.text: ====EV Modifiers==== {| class="wikitable" |+ EV Yield Modifiers ! EV Modifier || Method |- | 3x || Pokémon is encountered and captured as a [[Dungeons|Dungeon Pokémon]] |- | 10x || Pokémon is encountered and captured as a [[Dungeons|Dungeon Boss Pokémon]] |- | 5x || Obtained Pokémon is [[Shiny Chance|Shiny]]. |- | 5x || Pokémon is obtained using a [[Repeat Ball]] |- | 50x || Pokémon is encountered and captured as a [[Roaming Pokémon]] |- | Variable || [[Rowap|Rowap Berry Aura]] |} '''Note:''' The pokemons that wander to any berry won't get any EV
